# How to Play Super Mario Games for Free on Windows 7 Full 16
 
If you are a fan of the classic Super Mario games, you might be wondering how to play them on your Windows 7 Full 16 computer. ## What are Emulators and ROMs?
 
An emulator is a software program that mimics the functionality of a different device or system. For example, a Nintendo emulator can run Nintendo games on your computer by simulating the hardware and software of the original console. A ROM is a file that contains the data of a game cartridge or disc. For example, a Super Mario Bros. ROM is a digital copy of the game that you can play on an emulator.
 
Emulators and ROMs are legal to use as long as you own the original game and console that you are emulating. However, downloading ROMs from unauthorized sources can be considered piracy and may violate copyright laws. Therefore, we recommend that you only use ROMs that you have legally obtained from your own cartridges or discs.
 
## How to Download and Install Emulators and ROMs?
 
There are many emulators and ROMs available online for various Nintendo consoles, such as NES, SNES, N64, GameCube, Wii, and more. However, not all of them are compatible with Windows 7 Full 16 or offer good performance and quality. Therefore, we suggest that you use the following emulators and ROMs for playing Super Mario games on your PC:
 
- [FCEUX](https://www.emulator-zone.com/doc.php/nes/fceux.html): This is one of the best NES emulators for Windows 7 Full 16. It supports a wide range of NES games, including Super Mario Bros., Super Mario Bros. 2, Super Mario Bros. 3, and more. It also has features such as save states, cheats, video filters, and netplay.
- [SNES9X](https://www.emulator-zone.com/doc.php/snes/snes9x.html): This is one of the best SNES emulators for Windows 7 Full 16. It supports a wide range of SNES games, including Super Mario World, Super Mario Kart, Super Mario RPG, and more. It also has features such as save states, cheats, video filters, and netplay.
- [Project64](https://www.emulator-zone.com/doc.php/n64/project64.html): This is one of the best N64 emulators for Windows 7 Full 16. It supports a wide range of N64 games, including Super Mario 64, Mario Kart 64, Paper Mario, and more. It also has features such as save states, cheats, video filters, and netplay.
- [Dolphin](https://www.emulator-zone.com/doc.php/gamecube/dolphin.html): This is one of the best GameCube and Wii emulators for Windows 7 Full 16. It supports a wide range of GameCube and Wii games, including Super Mario Sunshine, Super Mario Galaxy, New Super Mario Bros. Wii, and more. It also has features such as save states, cheats, video filters, netplay, and motion controls.
